text: William Paul Girvan (born 6 July 1963) is a Northern Irish politician of the Democratic Unionist Party. He has been an MP for South Antrim since 2017, and was a member of the Northern Ireland Assembly from 2010 to 2017. He was also mayor of Newtownabbey Borough Council from 2002 to 2004. == Other websites == * Mr Paul Girvan, Northern Ireland Assembly * Paul Girvan MP, UK Parliament Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:British mayors Category:Democratic Unionist Party MPs Category:Democratic Unionist Party members of the Northern Ireland Assembly Category:UK MPs 2017–2019 Category:UK MPs 2019–2024
title: Paul Girvan
